Name: CLT Sage Mama Village and Stone Soup Gatherings
Address: Blowing Rock, NC (Join Facebook Group for specific location, see Website)
Description: From the city to the mountains and into new communities, Stone Soup Gatherings are blooming—a simple, heartfelt return to village life. These circles weave women of all ages—Maidens, Mothers, Queens, and Crones—into a living web of connection and support around new mothers and their babies.
Details: Twice a month, we gather around a shared table with nourishing food and open-hearted conversation. Together, we build each other up, offer stories and songs, and exchange gentle wisdom—from belly mapping to baby soothing, herbal teas to ancestral traditions. This isn’t just a moms’ group. It’s a sanctuary of shared presence, where every voice is welcome, every journey honored, and no one walks alone. Come as you are. Bring what you have. Together, we create something beautiful.
When: Twice a month (Join Facebook Group for info, see website)
